overview:
## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/id] is a string that contains the alphanumeric offer identifier you provide when you configure an offer in App Store Connect.

This value is `nil` if the offer is an [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/OfferType/introductory] offer.

Pass the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/id] to a method in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/purchase(options:)] to create a purchase option based on the offer’s [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/type]. For example, pass the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/id] for a promotional offer to the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/PurchaseOption/promotionalOffer(offerID:signature:)] to apply the promotion to a purchase.

For more information about configuring offers in App Store Connect, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer].

# id

**Instance Property**

The offer identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
let id: String?
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/id] is a string that contains the alphanumeric offer identifier you provide when you configure an offer in App Store Connect.

This value is `nil` if the offer is an [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/OfferType/introductory] offer.

Pass the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/id] to a method in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/purchase(options:)] to create a purchase option based on the offer’s [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/type]. For example, pass the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer/id] for a promotional offer to the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/PurchaseOption/promotionalOffer(offerID:signature:)] to apply the promotion to a purchase.

For more information about configuring offers in App Store Connect, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/SubscriptionOffer].
title: id
